Translations.Text: La iuennaa lbabuo. Yal tikelt ara aaddin $uoes imvebboen n ugdud is, tkaariren fellas. Inna: "ma temmaalkem degne$, ihi, a nemmaalek degwen akken temmaalkem
Deqqal a ppeeoem, u$uo ara d ias uaaqeb ara t isdullen, ara ieaz uaaqeb imezgi
Alamma, mi d iusa lameo nneÂ£, la pfeggiven igwefran d ihedman, Nenna: "awi degs tayuga n yal uuenf, tawacult ik - siwa wid i$ef id izwar wawal -, akked wid iumnen". Drus kan i iumnen yides
Inna: "rekbet degs, s yisem n Oebbi, acali s akked trusi s. Mass iw, s tidep, Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
Icula yissen, di lemwao anect idurar. Issawel Nue i mmi s, i illan weedes: "a mmi ali d yidne$, ur teppiliv ar ijehliyen
Inna: "uuoan iw d adrar, ad iyi isellek seg waman". Inna: "assa, ulac leslak si lameo n Oebbi, siwa i win i$ef Ieun". Aaddant lemwao garasen. Iuebe ed seg wid ipwa$emqen
Nnan: "a tamurt, seblaa aman im, a yigenni euufu". Aman zzren. Iuao lameo: irs $ef Loudi. Iffe$ uberrae: akin agdud imednas
Inuj Nue ar Mass is, inna: "a Mass iw! Ni$ mmi n twacult iw. Ih, lemaahda K d tidep, Kecc Tifev akw imeaddan
